title: Love Stories
description:
'Love Stories'

Printed in France by Pollina, Lucon, 1983, 62 pages

Contributions from Estebon Maroto, Jaime Mas Puigagut, Jose Martin Sauri, Victor Togliani, Adriano Gon, Georges Pichard, Matteo Guarnaccia, Enea Riboldi, Maruo Meda, Tanino Liberatore, Daniel Barbezzeni, Massimo Mariani    

A group of wordless short stories, each done with just a handful of painted images, that end with a twist. Sometimes funny, dark or ironic - always unexpected. Every short story is painted by a different person. I enjoyed this one more than I thought I was going to.
